Name: Summer In Memoria
About the game: It can be hard sometimes, looking into the void beyond... Your name is Leonard. You are playing tag with your friends. Tag all eleven and you win the game. It's that easy! Or is it? Why are you compelled to do this? By who? For what purpose? Styled after point-and-click adventure games, Summer in Memoria spins a dark narrative against a surreal backdrop. Explore strange lands and solve puzzles to help you complete your mission. Along the way you'll find: -Artifacts: They have no discernable effect, but maybe they'll be helpful later? -Memoria: Special abilities to help you in your task. -Objects that may or may not solve the puzzle you're stuck on. -Creatures that are humorous or disturbing, or even both!
